title: Manage Final Project Documentation
description: As a project nears completion, a document controller must assemble the final handover package of all drawings, manuals, and certificates for the client.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all required handover documents from the project plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a checklist of all required documents.

tasks.description: For each item on the checklist, retrieve the final approved version from the document management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent gathers all the final documents.

tasks.description: Compile all the documents into a single, structured handover package and transmit it to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the final documentation package and formally transmits it.
